Uses of Piece in backend
 

Subinterfaces of Piece in backend
 interface Ball
          Ball - represents a ball in the gizmoball game.
 interface Gizmo
          Gizmo - represents a gizmo in the gizmoball game
 interface MobileGizmo
          MobileGizmo - represents a mobile gizmo in the gizmoball game.

          RotatableGizmo - represents a rotatable gizmo in the gizmoball game.
 interface StaticGizmo
          StaticGizmo - represents a static gizmo in the gizmoball game.
